verbose_text: On the other hand, terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase (TdT), which generates junctional diversity in V (D) J recombination by attaching additional nucleotides (so called N nucleotides) at the 3 '-end of gene segments in a template independent way, is not expressed in fetal thymus and starts to be expressed 4 days after birth.
